# Importing dataset

```{r}
nutri_2015 <- read_csv(path("NFHS_2015.csv"))
spec(nutri_2015)
```

```{r layout="l-body-outset"}
nutri_2015
```

```{r}
glimpse(nutri_2015)
```

```{r}
skim(nutri_2015)
```

Cleaning and standardizing variable names

```{r}
nutri_2015 <- clean_names(nutri_2015)
```

Recoding the values of columns: stunting_range_d, uw_range_d, wasting_range_d

Stunting
```{r}
nutri_2015["stunting_range_d"][nutri_2015["stunting_range_d"] == "Low (< 25%)"] <- "Low"
nutri_2015["stunting_range_d"][nutri_2015["stunting_range_d"] == "Medium (25% - 40%)"] <- "Medium"
nutri_2015["stunting_range_d"][nutri_2015["stunting_range_d"] == "High (> 40%)"] <- "High"
```

Underweight
```{r}
nutri_2015["uw_range_d"][nutri_2015["uw_range_d"] == "Low (< 20%)"] <- "Low"
nutri_2015["uw_range_d"][nutri_2015["uw_range_d"] == "Medium (20% - 40%)"] <- "Medium"
nutri_2015["uw_range_d"][nutri_2015["uw_range_d"] == "High (> 40%)"] <- "High"
```

Wasting
```{r}
nutri_2015["wasting_range_d"][nutri_2015["wasting_range_d"] == "Low (< 15%)"] <- "Low"
nutri_2015["wasting_range_d"][nutri_2015["wasting_range_d"] == "Medium (15% - 25%)"] <- "Medium"
nutri_2015["wasting_range_d"][nutri_2015["wasting_range_d"] == "High (> 25%)"] <- "High"
```

For now, we will be focussing on the three variables related to nutrition: Stunting, Underweight, Wasting
